publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1041 Cathy Jamieson: Forgotten Children Campaign—That the Parliament supports the "Forgotten Children Campaign" launched by Save the Children to draw attention to the suffering of the 20 million children who have been forced from their homes by war and urges all MSPs to donate photographs as a contribution to the campaign’s "Portrait Pledge Photographs" initiative.
S1M-1041 Forgotten Children Campaign (lodged on 21 June 2000) Marilyn Livingstone*

S1M-1041 Cathy Jamieson: Forgotten Children Campaign—That the Parliament supports the "Forgotten Children Campaign" launched by Save the Children to draw attention to the suffering of the 20 million children who have been forced from their homes by war and urges all MSPs to donate photographs as a contribution to the campaign’s "Portrait Pledge Photographs" initiative. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone
S1M-1041 Forgotten Children Campaign (lodged on 21 June 2000) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-1041 Forgotten Children Campaign (lodged on 21 June 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Fiona McLeod*, Alex Neil*, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-1041 Forgotten Children Campaign (lodged on 21 June 2000) Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Scott Barrie*
